attributes.action: ALL UN Members States Must Condemn and Eject from the UN all those that disobey its judgements
attributes.additional_details:
All United Nations Member States Must Immediately Condemn and Eject from the UN ALL those Countries that disobey UN Judgements; otherwise the UN is not worth the Paper its Printed on and all Current Members SHOULD therefore dissolve themselves from the UN in such a case.
Any Country taking Unilateral Actions contrary to UN Judgements must themselves be targeted for both Military and Financial attacks.
The UN IS OTHERWISE SEEN TO BE A MOCKERY AND IS WORTHLESS.
